pli-tv-bu-vb-sk5:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk5:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū hatthampi pādampi kīḷāpentā antaraghare gacchanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk5:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā kīḷāpento antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk5:9.2: asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantassa, gilānassa, ummattakassa, ādikammikassāti.
